description.value:
Placed under the eyes like rays of light, this tattoo burns away illusions with the unmerciful brilliance of the sun. You gain a +2 bonus to Perception checks that involve sight. If you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled], you receive a new save at the start of each of your turns to end your dazzled condition.

Activate1 to 3 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect The tattoo casts a 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Scorching Ray], with the rays emitting from your eyes. The number of actions you spend Activating the tattoo determines scorching ray's number of rays. The tattoo also attempts to dispel each illusion on a creature hit by a ray (counteract level 5th, counteract modifier +19).
